review_content: I really liked these boots--they are comfortable and fit nicely.
Beautiful boots, fit great and look great. Haven’t worn them in the rain yet, which was the main reason I got these, but regardless I love these boots.
These were a gift for my boyfriend. We often go on impromptu hikes so I really wanted him to have an everyday option that look great and are functional. I love these and so does he!
They are very comfortable. All around very nice. And they look fantastic as well
Great boot for the summer. They keep your feet cool due to the canvas, and good support for walking.
The leather boots are taking some time to break in, but I can already tell they are going to be comfortable. I am satified with this product and plan to explore Palladium further.

Perfect hot climate boots. Buy like sneakers, a size or half size larger than your shoes. I wear between 10 and 10.5 depending on shape and padding. With these I bought 11. Did this because I know canvas shrinks when wet. These are my afternoon hunting boots. Very cool in the tropical sun where I live. Now own two pair in different colours. Also wear them when sporting clay shooting. You wont be disappointed.

Not to be picky ... my right foot is a small trifle larger than my left and I do notice it with these shoes. I generally go with an 8.5, as I ride a motorcycle and 9's always feel funny with the shifter. On that, these work great as summer bike boots. Well made.
Really nice looking and appears to be well made. They were a little tight at first, but loosened up nicely after wearing them for a day or two.

I love the boots, they are comfortable, well made, did not take as long as I expected to get. I did order a size larger because of reviews stating they run small but I should have ordered correct size, they are alittle big but I wear two socks and all is well.

review_title: HELLO, I LOVE MY BOOTS ! EVERYONE THAT SEES THEM THINKS THEY ARE AWESOME !
review_content: 100 percent positive ! Will be getting a second pair soon ! Thank you , Yes We Vibe !
Super comfy, bright and colourful. They are gorgeous and unique :)
Perfect peace boots Many compliments when I wear them
Delivery was a bit delayed, but when they did eventually arrive it was worth it. They are so comfortable and so gorgeous!
Love them super comfy

I LOVE THESE BOOTS! I love boots and am always looking for something fun and u unusual ~~ these are awesome looking and super comfortable. I have wide feet so it’s hard for me to find cute boots that fit, these are wide and so flexible they feel great! I wore them out dancing and on my motorcycle and they feel wonderful! I could not be happier with these boots! (Iv ordered 3 more pairs!)
I just love them. Super comfortable and great design!

review_title: PURPLE PEACE & MANDALA FOREVER! AND I LOVE THE TOTE, TOO!
review_content: The boots and the bag get attention every time I am out and about. I love them, the boots are so comfy, and I feel totally "vibed out" when I wear the boots and/or carry the bag. :-) I will definitely be ordering other styles. Oh yes, I Vibe, big time!
Fit well and are comfortable
everybody wants to know where i bought my shoes!
Perfect fit and so comfortable! I've gotten lots of compliments on them, so far! Thanks!
My Boots are AWESOME so COOL !!
Love these boots they support my ankles, very comfortable. Lots of compliments. I give interest customer's to your website.
Love my boots!! Comfortable and cute!!
Very comfy!! We loved by all, but especially me! Can't wait to order my next pair!

reçu ce jour, elles sont magnifiques, très légères et de qualité, la livraison pour la France a été de jours environ merci je recommande I'm a fan of the boots. I received them today, they're beautiful. They're very light and made of good quality. Delivery to France was fast. Highly recommended.
Me encantan las botas. Son muy cómodas y el trato de "yes we vibe" es genial! Original and very comfortable! I love the boots. They're very comfortable to wear and Yes We Vibe are Awesome!
They are very comfortable and the compliments never stop!
wonderfull!!!!!!!
I LOVE these boots! They are super comfortable and very stylish.
I love my custom boots! They took a while to get here but they are quality made, fit perfectly and are very comfortable!
I just love these boots. They are beautiful, unique, and so comfortable!

review_title: DRAGONFLY BOOTS, BOHIEM BAG AND BOHIEM BOOTS
review_content: I love everything you have sent me. I love my two pairs of boots. And I got the bag for my daughter. I am Awesomely happy about your customer service as well. Blessings to you all love light and peace Linda..
Love, love, love my boots and matching bag!!!!!!
I have four pairs of these boots and LOVE them. They are creative, beautiful, comfortable, can't say enough!! I plan to get more.
I love my boots comfortable fit and beautiful, makes me happy to put them on!! thank you
Roses are Red Violets are bue Boots are not for me But for my beloved wifei thats who. SHE LOVES THEM..

I'm proudly rockin' these beautiful boots that get lots of attention and compliments!!! I was a little concerned that I ordered a size too small because there was no half-size option, but they fit perfectly AND they are comfortably sturdy.

review_title: JUST LIKE IN THE PICTURE AND THEY FIT PERFECTLY
review_content: It took many weeks to get them, but they came from Hong Kong and then got stuck in Ohio for a couple of weeks to boot (unintended pun). I'm wearing them today as it's SNOWING on this 17th of April!!!
LOVE LOVE LOVE THEM!
Very very comfy and darling to wear! So many compliments from friends and strangers.
Awesome shoes and they’re comfortable right away. Get lots of compliments

I love my boots! I got them a little large and added orthotics for my flat feet. :-) They are perfect. So comfortable, and I get compliments like "love the boots", or "cool boots" every time I wear them. The boots seem very well made, and look great. When I wear them, I definitely have good vibes!
Excellent, all the way around!!!
These boots are even more gorgeous than I thought they would be. Comfortable, durable, and fabulous!
I love my boots and my peace slip ons. Great products and my happy feet can’t stop dancing❤️
Love the boots - had a size issue (my error) and they fixed it sending me the correct size! Very good company that cares about the customers and their whole experience!
Fantastic!! My next pair are going to be the Hippie Dog, when I can afford them!

It did not disappoint. The boot is the perfect size (which can be tricky when converting from other country standards), the quality is very good, and it's very comfortable (surprisingly so, actually; the sole has just the right amount of support and the structure is well fitted). In addition the print is amazing, and I get a lot of questions and compliments. I'll be back!

Everyone comments on my purple mandala and chakra boots and want to know where I got them so of course I tell them about the amazing Yeswevibe online store! The boots are so comfortable, I feel the need for another pair coming on, and the carseat covers too!!!! Fantastic products!

Love the boot for size and feel and look. They are my most difficult pair to get on and off, maybe because of the stretchy shoelaces. I have to take time to really open up the laces to get off and on. But I think they look just grand. I could try some other shoelaces.
Snazzy, stylish and comfortable! The kind of boots that garner compliments from strangers. What's not to love?
son unas botas muy cómodas y de calce perfecto
Love them and they are comfortable 2.
The boots are great as well as very comfortable. Good experience overall.
Very comfortable and uniquely designed boots!
I really am enjoying these boots as they are well made and comfortable. I have walked all over Paris in them and so happy to have such good quality of a boot!
Love it. Get many compliments and inquiries. very comfortable as well.
I love my new ride!!

These boots are exactly as awesome as I wanted them to be!! Size is true, comfort is great, pictures really are accurate. I've been cuffing my jeans, just to better show them off. It's 95 degrees here today, and you're damn right I'm wearing them anyway!
They are comfortable and a conversation starter. The only thing I didn’t like was having to decide between different designs, cuz they are all so cute!
My boots have been universally admired. This time I bought a pair for my friend Stephen. He couldn't believe how comfortable they are. Thank you

The boots are great, I can fit my orthotics into them but since I am still getting used to my orthotics I wear them with my boots and other shoes only 4-5 hours at a time. I've received several compliments on the boots' colorful designs and they go with several of my tees and pants. I love them but will have to save up for another pair costwise! I'd love to have them in red but you have no red background in any of the designs.
I love these boots! So beautiful and comfortable! Wish I could send you a pic but don't have a camera of any kind. :(

I love my boots. They are so comfortable & I could walk in them forever. I get so many compliments on them and I have given the name of your company to many people, so I hope you get more orders. I will try to send you a picture. If they ever go on sale could you let me know as I would love to order more. Thanks
Second pair is perfect and happy with it. Outstanding service, now i have a big sized pair going to goodwill. Thank u
Love your product.. My boots are so comfy and fit great.. Definitely meet my expectations.
Great! Took longer than expected but totally worth the wait! Love my boots!
Well built boot...stylish and overall cool😊
Excellent boots - GORGEOUS. tons of compliments... also excellent customer service... this place is a gem I would recommend to all my friends...
Not sure yet. Boots are pretty. Just waiting on replacement boots in a smaller size. They were too big. Customer service however was very responsive and professional.

review_title: BEST ZEN BOOTS IN THE UNIVERSE!
review_content: I Love Love Love my purple peace mandala boots! I am a Aussie size 9 and the US 9 fits perfectly! The boots are so supportive and comfortable, I just had to buy another pair!! The worst thing is which design to choose!! My Space Dream Catcher boots should arrive soon... then I will have to decide which boots to wear each day!! Thank You, YES WE VIBE!! Now I Vibe, too! <3

The overall was experience was great! I still have not received the correct size boots but I know it takes a little while for them to come, I was very impressed with customer service prompt reply and willingness to correct the issue. you guys are awesome and I will be purchasing from you in the future!
Great! Absolutely the nicest pair of boots I've had in years! Service great 👍
Feet meet fun! I love them! On my feet all day at work and they are super comfy. Lots of compliments. The product is well made so I plan on ordering more of their products.

Very well made, nice quality boot with a unique design. Comfortable, nice wide toe box, great sole with good grip. Everyone who sees them think they are pretty awesome and want to know where I get them.
I love these. Every time I put them on, I smile. The fit is excellent and they are immediately comfortable
Got these boots for my daughters 16th birthday.....she absolutely loves them and they look great. Quick international delivery time also
I love my boots and have had so many complements.
